text: This study delves into Multimodal Emotion Recognition in Conversations (ERC), aiming to decipher emotional cues within conversational videos. It addresses challenges related to intra- and inter-speaker context dependencies and introduces an adaptive interactive graph network (AdaIGN) named AdaIGN. AdaIGN utilizes advanced node and edge selection strategies, including Node- and Edge-level Selection Policies (NESP), to enhance emotion recognition accuracy. The study prioritizes task-specific loss functions and self-supervised methods to improve computational efficiency and performance on diverse datasets.
